general.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
general.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
general.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
general.alpha_dash: The :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
general.alpha_num: The :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
general.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
general.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
general.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
general.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
general.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
general.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
general.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
general.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
general.ends_with: The :attribute must end with one of the following: :values.
general.file: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
general.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
general.in-array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
general.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
general.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
general.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
general.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
general.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
general.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
general.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
general.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
general.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
general.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
general.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
general.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
general.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid zone.
general.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
general.not_registerd_using_email: You can't reset password because you have not registered using Email

between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
between.array: The :attribute should be between :min and :max items.

gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.
gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items

gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value.
gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value kilobytes.
gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal :value characters.
gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.

lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.
lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.

lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value.
lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value kilobytes.
lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal :value characters.
lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.

max.numeric: The :attribute may not be greater than :max.
max.file: The :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.string: The :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.
max.array: The :attribute may not have more than :max items.

min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
